titleStmt.title: The case of the old secured, secluded, and now excluded Members, briefly and truly stated; for their own vindication, and their electors and the kingdoms satisfaction. / By William Prynne of Lincolns Inne Esq; one of those Members.
titleStmt.author: Prynne, William, 1600-1669.

titleStmt.title: The case of the old secured, secluded, and now excluded Members, briefly and truly stated; for their own vindication, and their electors and the kingdoms satisfaction. / By William Prynne of Lincolns Inne Esq; one of those Members.
titleStmt.author: Prynne, William, 1600-1669.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed, and are to be sold by Edward Thomas, at the Adam and Eve in Little Britain,

notesStmt.note: There are two printings, one slightly revised, order not determined: (1) with side-notes on the last page; text ends "those for whom they served."; (2) last page side-notes and some others lacking; text ends "whereof they were fellow-members.".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
